Title: Alyosha Popovich and Tugarin Zmey
Writer: Aleksandr Boyarskiy, Konstantin Bronzit, Ilya Maksimov, Maksim Sveshnikov
Actors: Oleg Kulikovich, Liya Medvedeva, Dmitriy Vysotskiy, Anatoliy Petrov
Plot: Alesha Popovich has to catch Tugarin Zmey and bring back the stolen money money with the help of a talking Horse (which talks all the time and has an opinion on everything), a wise granny, a donkey and a beauty Lyubava.
